description: This file declares the IController interface within the WPEFramework's PluginHost namespace. It defines several virtual methods related to device or system control operations such as Persist, Delete, Reboot, Environment, Configuration, and Clone. The interface is marked as deprecated and external, indicating it is an API used outside of the current module.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for system or device control operations with methods for persistence, deletion, rebooting, environment retrieval, configuration management, and cloning. It inherits from Core::IUnknown and is marked as deprecated.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persist state or data; the specific behavior depends on implementation.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource specified by the given path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment information based on an index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration associated with a callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets the configuration for a callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clones a system or device profile from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
